metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4186 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Downloads in Google Chromeprior to 108.0.5359.71 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to installa malicious extension to bypass Downloads restrictions via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
